NAME: --display_name
DESCRIPTION: Set the display name of your app

NAME: --main
DESCRIPTION: Set the display name of your app

NAME: --memory
DESCRIPTION: Set the memory of the app

NAME: --version
DESCRIPTION: Ensure that the version is either "recommended" or "latest"

NAME: --avatar
DESCRIPTION: Specify the avatar of the application

NAME: --description
DESCRIPTION: Specify a description for the app

NAME: --subdomain
DESCRIPTION: Specify the subdomain of your app

NAME: --start
DESCRIPTION: Specify the command that should be run when the application starts

NAME: --auto_restart
DESCRIPTION: Determine if the app should restart automatically after a crash
